articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
There's 3 new quests to earn $JCOIN:
- Has bridged with @HopProtocol 
- Completed @optimismFND quests
- Did a swap on Uniswap or LP'd on @0xPolygon 
To claim you need to be US🇺🇸-based as it requires a @JunoFinanceHQ account.

DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊: $JCOIN Airdrop for users of select DeFi protocols by @junofinancehq.
Who is eligible?
- @Uniswap LP's
- NFT traders on @opensea 
- ENS domain holders
Juno is a web3 compatible bank account bridging the gap between TradFi & DeFi with a $USDC enabled debit card

🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨
Early play but @zkBob_ is VERY interesting!
$BOB is a stablecoin with a built-in privacy layer on @0xPolygon.
You can deposit $BOB into a pool & transfer it to anyone within that pool 100% privately. 
Built with zk-SNARKS by the former @xdaichain team.
